question: Which bank launches the Union Sahyog app to digitise customer-facing banking services?
explanation: Union Bank of India launched an Android app named, 'Union Sahyog', as a part of its efforts to digitise customer-facing banking services. The Union Sahyog App consists of: all mobile-based banking applications, missed call/SMS-based services, Internet banking login and self-user creation, deposit and loan product information, online account opening, online loan application, online complaints, RTI (Right To Information), branch locator, EMI calculator, social media links and digital banking information.
